nl.helixsoft.stats

Class DataFrameOperation.MergeBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.helixsoft.stats.DataFrameOperation.MergeBuilder
  • Enclosing class:
    DataFrameOperation

    public static class DataFrameOperation.MergeBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builder class to make it easy to set parameters for a merge (i.e. join) operation.

    • Method Summary

      set the join column name, in the case that it's the same column name for both data frames

      Set the column indices that are used in the join
